title.native: アイドルマスター SideM

description:
Based on the Idom@ster SideM app.

315 Production – a newly set up small talent agency – has assembled a group of aspiring male idols from various occupational fields. They include a former lawyer, a former doctor, former pilot and so on… Even though everyone hails from different background, they share a common dream: to be the top idol. And so, the stories of these male idols at 315 Production take centre stage…

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Includes episode 0 prologue, Episode of Jupiter.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.
